Pemprov Jabar Butuh 3.704 PNS, Lowongan CPNS Lebih Sedikit
05 Nov 2019, 06:54 by Novianti Nurulliah
BANDUNG, (PR).- Kebutuhan PNS di Pemerintah Provinsi Jawa Barat hingga Juli 2019 berjumlah 3.704 orang. Sementara itu, Pemerintah Pusat memberikan jatah formasi CPNS untuk Jawa Barat 1.934 orang.
Penjabat Sekretaris Daerah Jabar Daud Achmad mengatakan, dengan kebutuhan CPNS tersebut dan jumlah formasi CPNS 2019 yang hanya 1.934 orang, Pemprov Jabar masih kekurangan tenaga PNS. Namun Pemprov akan memaksimalkan tenaga PNS yang ada.
"Jumlah kekurangan PNS di Jabar ini kemungkinan besar akan lebih banyak dari sisa kebutuhan PNS dikurangi formasi CPNS 2019 jika terpenuhi. Kami belum mendata jumlah PNS yang pensiun sejak Agustus hingga akhir tahun 2018," ujar Daud, Selasa 5 November 2019.
Menurut Daud, karena kekurangan PNS, Pemprov Jabar akan mendata pula PNS pensiun yang tidak perlu diganti dengan jumlah SDM yang sama. Di antara formasi yang ditinggalkan, bisa saja berkurang kebutuhannya karena tergantikan teknologi.
"Dengan kemajuan teknologi, kebutuhan orang bisa diganti. Misalnya yang pensiun ada sepuluh, setelah kami data, ternyata penggantinya bisa saja kurang, tapi hal itu masih didata," ujar dia.
Pemprov Jabar membuka 1.934 formasi CPNS untuk 2019. Formasi yang tersedia terdiri atas tenaga pendidik 839 orang, tenaga kesehatan 93 orang, tenaga teknis pelaksana dan fungsional 1.002 orang.
Terbesar di Indonesia
Daud mengatakan, jumlah kebutuhan pegawai di Pemprov Jabar jadi salah satu yang terbesar di Indonesia. Jumlah pegawai di Jabar yang pensiun mencapai 1.800 orang per tahunnya.
"Selain mengisi posisi yang ditinggal pensiun, ada posisi yang kosong karena pemerintah sempat tidak melakukan rekrutmen beberapa tahun lalu, yang secara bertahap, kebutuhannya dipenuhi setiap tahunnya," ucap Daud di Gedung Sate, Jalan Diponegoro, Kota Bandung, Selasa 29 Oktober 2019.***

West Java Provincial Government Needs 3,704 Civil Servants, Fewer CPNS Vacancies
05 Nov 2019, 06:54 by Novianti Nurulliah
BANDUNG, (PR) .- The needs of civil servants in the West Java Provincial Government as of July 2019 totaled 3,704 people. Meanwhile, the Central Government provided CPNS formation allocations for West Java 1,934 people.
Acting Regional Secretary of West Java Daud Achmad said, with the CPNS needs and the number of 2019 CPNS formations which were only 1,934 people, the West Java Provincial Government was still short of civil servants. But the Provincial Government will maximize the existing civil servants.
"The number of civil servant shortages in West Java is likely to be more than the rest of the needs of civil servants reduced by the formation of CPNS 2019 if met. We have not recorded the number of civil servants who retired from August to the end of 2018," Daud said, Tuesday, November 5, 2019.
According to Daud, because of a shortage of civil servants, the West Java Provincial Government will also record retired civil servants who do not need to be replaced with the same number of human resources. Among the formations left behind, their needs may be reduced due to technology being replaced.
"With the advancement in technology, the needs of people can be replaced. For example, there are ten retirement, after we data, it turns out that replacements can be lacking, but it is still being recorded," he said.
West Java Provincial Government opened 1,934 CPNS formations for 2019. The available formations consisted of 839 teaching staff, 93 health workers, 1,002 implementing technical personnel and functional personnel.
The biggest in Indonesia
Daud said, the number of employee needs in the West Java Provincial Government was one of the largest in Indonesia. The number of employees in West Java who retire reaches 1,800 people annually.
"In addition to filling positions left behind by retirement, there are vacant positions because the government did not recruit several years ago, which gradually, their needs are met every year," said Daud at Gedung Sate, Jalan Diponegoro, Bandung, Tuesday, October 29, 2019. * **
